TextView.android:text:
Our application turns your journey into an interactive experience, providing detailed insights and real-time tracking of your adventures. 

Key Features: 

 - Live GPS Mapping: Watch your route unfold in real time on the map, ensuring you're always on track and aware of your surroundings. 

 - Comprehensive GPX File Generation: Automatically create GPX files of your routes, perfect for sharing or revisiting your adventures. 

 - Total Distance and Time Tracking: Get accurate measurements of the total distance covered and the duration of your journey, helping you gauge your performance. 

 - Waypoint Management: Mark and manage significant points along your route, enhancing your navigation and experience. 

 - Coordinate Display: View precise geographical coordinates at any point in your journey, connecting you more closely to the terrain. 

 - Voice Command Integration: Hands-free control through voice commands, making it easier to use the app while on the move.
